events.message: Hello, I recently received my order but want to request a refund because the item is not as described. Could you please help me with the return process?
The issue has been classified under the Refund cluster due to customer request related to returning an item.
This case has been assigned to agent Sarah M. to assist with the refund request and provide next steps.
Hi! Thank you for reaching out. I’m Sarah and I’ll help you with your refund request. Could you please provide your order number?
To move forward with the refund, could you also let me know why you wish to return the item? Any details would be helpful.
Order number is 789456123. The item differs from the product description and images shown on the site, so I want to get my money back.
Thank you for the details. We will initiate a refund once we receive the returned item. I’m sending you the prepaid return label and instructions now.
I appreciate the quick response and receiving the return label so fast. I’ll send the item back by tomorrow.
We have received the returned package and processed your refund. The amount should reflect on your original payment method within 3-5 business days.
Just checking in to confirm that you have received the refund and if there’s anything else we can assist you with today.
Yes, the refund came through this morning. Thank you for your help and clear communication throughout the process.
We’re glad we could resolve your issue. Closing the case now but feel free to contact us anytime for further assistance.
